title: Crazy Kinky Dirty Pirates
description: --- Captain Dick and his crew invite you aboard! ---All Kyle knows is that he’s in for a vacation break of a lifetime. He is going to the seaside with his boyfriend Dan, and as he loves surprises, he lets Dan arrange all the details. What he doesn’t know is that he is about to get kidnapped by a whole crew of pirates, all of them sex starved for a slave boy they can keep on board and fuck whenever they please. Kyle’s endurance will be tested to the limits, and the surprises will keep coming, as Dan ups the game once more, with a treasure map to much more than a stack of chocolate coins.POSSIBLE SPOILERS:Themes: pirates, kidnapping, established coupleGenre: erotica, contemporaryErotic content: sizzling hot graphic language, multiple partners, humiliation, roleplay, bondage, toys, forced feminization, food play, spankingLength: ~25,000 words
author: K.A. Merikan
